name: Knight Runner (bertonq)
description:
Reach the end of the all levels before time runs out! Time remaining from each level carries over to the next level. See if you can complete every level!

(The game isn't perfect. Sometimes the character gets 'stuck'. If so, just jump and it should be fixed)

Developers: Rigel Chan, Berton Quon, Donguk Oh, Jacky Wong

Music by: Aaron Mullin (Internal Frequency)
